preqs: MGP1010 or MGF1010 or MGW1010 or MKB1010 or MGG1010 or MGS1010.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 20, 41, 50}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGF1010, MGG1010, MGP1010, MGS1010, MGW1010} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Unit was previously coded {3365, 3365P, GBU3312%, GSM2430, MGB2324%, MGC2430, MGF2661, MGG2324%, MGG2430, MGS2430, MGW2430%}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MGB2430, MGC2430, MGF2661, MGG2430, MGW2430}

description: This unit explores the strategic role of HRM in organisations, human resource planning, job design, staffing, performance management, training and development, reward systems, legal issues in employment, HR information systems and the contribution of HRM to competitive advantage.
